data.name: Blades of Worlds
data.detailed_description:
Blades of Worlds is an action role-playing game with platformer elements set in a fantasy medieval world.

The year is 1491 and the world you have lived in has been hit by another world that has life similar to the one you have lived in. The colliding of these worlds has created a chaos and most things have transformed into dangerous things. Now you must find ways to survive and potentially end the chaos.

Deep combat system
  • Fight through dangers with a very deep combat system with each attack having it's own strength and weakness.
  • Find various ways to deal with dangers.
Character customization
  • Shape your character to look unique and having his or her own story.
  • Become nimble, strong or magical. The choice is yours.
Make complex decisions
  • Make decisions that change how characters view and treat you as.
  • Some decisions lead to changing the world in unexpected ways.
Explore the mysterious world
  • Find clues about what is happening in this world and to help you get information in increasing your vocabulary.
Limited resources
  • Limited carrying ability. You must find equipment and resources that you can only switch if you find new ones to replace them.
  • With limited resources, spend them wisely on new stuff.

data.short_description: Blades of Worlds is an action role-playing game with platformer elements set in a fantasy medieval world. The year is 1491, which has turned into chaos by a world and most things have been transformed into dangerous things. Now you must survive and potentially end the chaos.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GPU GeForce GTX 560 / ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains plentiful of violence with blood enabled but the only gore in the game is the blood coming through cuts with a blade or from lifeless bodies. The game also is quite dark as the game has a dark atmosphere and story but it doesn't have any jump scares. The worst case scenario is just an enemy lying around a corner that would attack you after a while after you've been spotted, but you can spot them in advance.
